<h1>Input Data </h2>

<h2>Species</h2>

The required files are:
inside the folder named after the species code there are 4 files:

           FILE NAME                           EXAMPLE                                      COLUMNS

_{{{species_code_number}}}_.csv            e.g: 101616.csv	contains three columns: *{{{species_code}}}*, *longitude*, *latitude*
	
_{{species_code_number}}}_-chull.csv       e.g: 101616-chull.csv	contains two columns: *longitude*, *latitude*
	
_{{species_code_number}}}_-chull-buff.csv  e.g: 101616-chull-buff.csv	contains two columns: *longitude*, *latitude*

_{{species_code_number}}}_-info.txt        e.g:  101616-info.txt    


<h2> Bioclim </h2>

This folder requires each of the variables to have a file named p1.asc , p2.asc, p3.asc, etc.

 
 <h2>Summaries</h2>
 
 This folder holds shape file, it doesn't matter the name of the file although all the files must have the same name
 example: 
	SurAmerica.dbf
	SurAmerica.prj
	SurAmerica.qix
	SurAmerica.sbn
	SurAmerica.sbx
	SurAmerica.shp
	SurAmerica.shx
